archimate:Principle.name: Maintainable
archimate:Principle.documentation: The system should capable of being maintained in a state of good repair and effective, efficient operation. The actions required to achieve this should feasible within the normal for continuity of service, operational conditions of the system.

properties.value: Documented execution of a preventive maintenance schedule for both hardware and software, correlated against targets such as mean time between failures (MTBF)
